briefdescription.para: CFS Memory Manager (MM) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Memory Manager application entry point and main process loop.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the memory manager CFS application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Memory manager application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a single software bus command pipe message. Checks the message and command IDs and calls the appropriate routine to handle the command.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board housekeeping request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This command does not affect the command execution counter

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a reset counters ground command which will reset the memory manager commmand error and command execution counters to zero.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a lookup symbol ground command which takes a symbol name and tries to resolve it to an address using the OS_SymbolLookup OSAL function.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Dump symbol table to file command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a dump symbol table to file ground command which calls the OS_SymbolTableDump OSAL function using the specified dump file name.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a EEPROM write enable ground command which calls the #CFE_PSP_EepromWriteEnable cFE function using the specified bank number.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a EEPROM write disable ground command which calls the #CFE_PSP_EepromWriteDisable cFE function using the specified bank number.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
